name: daddy-jest
description: Daddy-Jest is an extension for Visual Studio Code for debugging Jest tests. This extension allows you to run individual tests in the debugger with multiple test configuration files..

daddy-jest.jestPath.title: Path to Jest package
daddy-jest.jestPath.description: Specify Jest directory path (leave empty to use default path)

daddy-jest.jestConfigPath.title: Jest config file path
daddy-jest.jestConfigPath.description: Specify Jest config file path (if empty Jest will look into 'package.json' by default)

daddy-jest.jestConfigPaths.title: Additional Jest config file paths

items.description: Relative path to Jest configuration file (json).

daddy-jest.jestConfigPaths.description: Have more that one Jest suites with different config files? Add more here as an array (if empty Jest will look into 'package.json' by default).
